data.enText: used to introduce the logical result of sth that has just been mentioned

data.chText: 他只有17岁，因此没有投票选举的资格。
data.enText: He's only 17 and therefore not eligible to vote.

data.chText: 要讨论的问题还有很多。所以，我们将在下次会议上再讨论这项议题。
data.enText: There is still much to discuss. We shall, therefore, return to this item at our next meeting.

ex.chText: 因此，这个问题应该用以下这种方法解决。
ex.enText: Accordingly/Therefore, this problem should be solved by the following method.

ex.chText: 为此，特提出以下3点建议。
ex.enText: Accordingly/Therefore, we hereby offer the following three suggestions.

ex.chText: 有些法律相互矛盾。因此，采取了措施予以阐明。
ex.enText: Some of the laws were contradictory. Accordingly/Therefore, measures were taken to clarify them.

synonyms.bx: 指由某种原因而得出某一结果，多用于句首，常可与 therefore 换用。

ex.chText: 她没有赶上火车，结果上班迟到了。
ex.enText: She missed the train and consequently was late for work.

ex.chText: 公司破产，他因此失业了。
ex.enText: The company went bankrupt. Consequently, he lost his job.

ex.chText: 因此，我们达成今年的目标应该没有问题。
ex.enText: Consequently, we should have no problem reaching our goals this year.

synonyms.bx: 强调有前因后果，符合逻辑关系。

ex.chText: 所以，这次全会意义重大。
ex.enText: Hence, this session is of great importance.

ex.chText: 他们在亚洲长大，因此对东方文化产生了兴趣。
ex.enText: They grew up in Asia, hence their interest in oriental culture.

ex.chText: 因此，我们的军队一定要胜利，而且一定会胜利。
ex.enText: Hence our army must and certainly will triumph.

synonyms.bx: 指随之而来的结果是理所当然的，同时也强调其重要性。

ex.chText: 她感到不适，所以想卧床休息。
ex.enText: She's not feeling well, so she wants to stay in bed.

ex.chText: 比利打了我，所以我也以牙还牙打了他。
ex.enText: Billy hit me, so I gave him back tit for tat.

ex.chText: 现在一切都过去了，别再去想它了。
ex.enText: It's all over now, so think no more of it.

synonyms.bx: 最普通用词，一般用于比较随便的场合，尤用于口语。

ex.chText: 这所房子要小一点，所以价格也就便宜一些。
ex.enText: This house is smaller and therefore cheaper.

ex.chText: 他们的人口在增长，因此他们需要更多的食物。
ex.enText: They have a growing population and therefore need more food.

ex.chText: 我姐姐喜欢听音乐，所以她常买唱片。
ex.enText: My sister likes to listen to music, therefore she often buys CDs.

synonyms.bx: 通常用于引出某一推断性的结论，与前述内容有因果关系。

ex.chText: 费伊用功读书，因此获得高分。
ex.enText: Fay studied hard; thus she received high marks.

ex.chText: 她忘了打开收音机，因此错过了那个节目。
ex.enText: She forgot to turn on the radio and thus missed the programme.

ex.chText: 他是长子，因此是头衔的继承人。
ex.enText: He is the eldest son and thus heir to the title.

synonyms.bx: 与 therefore 基本同义，但多用于书面语中。

tr: (used to introduce a logical conclusion) from that fact or reason or as a result
example: the eggs were fresh and hence satisfactory
we were young and thence optimistic
it is late and thus we must go
the witness is biased and so cannot be trusted
he had good reason to be grateful for the opportunities which they had made available to him and which consequently led to the good position he now held

value.def: You use therefore to introduce a logical result or conclusion.

example.ex: Muscle cells need lots of fuel and therefore burn lots of calories...
example.tran: 肌肉细胞需要很多能量，所以会燃烧大量卡路里。

example.ex: Nothing was to prevent him now from becoming the richest, and therefore the happiest, man in the world.
example.tran: 现在什么也阻挡不了他成为世上最富有因而也是最幸福的人。
